section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: PEIF is open to dialogue with all stakeholders with an interest in European affairs related to insurance and reinsurance. In particular, it cooperates with Insurance Europe, CFO and CRO Forums.
goals__remit:
PEIF is a forum of CEOs of major, European headquartered multinational (re-)insurance groups. Its purposes are: 
- to promote understanding and recognition of the role of the insurance business model within the development of the European Union and 
- to provide its Members with the opportunity to discuss major policy and strategic issues affecting the insurance business in Europe and worldwide.
